title: The Human body [the complete series] [DVD]
brief_description: Presented by Doctor and scientist Professor Lord Robert Winston, this double dvd set contains the complete series of the “Human body” (1998), from birth (Life story), to death (The End of life), and features ground breaking technology that takes the viewer on a thorough exploration of the human body. Each episode is also available on vhs. See these entries for an episode breakdown.
